subject: Marathon Running
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Saturday in Houston, Deena Kastor, the 2004 Olympic bronze medalist, will run her first marathon since London in April 2010, hoping to qualify for the 2012 Games.
snippet: Saturday in Houston, Deena Kastor, the 2004 Olympic bronze medalist, will run her first marathon since London in April 2010, hoping to qualify for the 2012 Games.
